ie.gmit.sw.api.similarity.shingles

Class WordShinglizer

  • Object
    • WordShinglizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shinglizer

    public class WordShinglizer
extends Object
implements Shinglizer
    The type Word shinglizer. An implementation of Shinglizer that breaks up a Document into multiple Shingles.

      Takes a collection of strings and returns a new collection with every string changed to lower case.
      ShinglizeResult shinglize(Document document)
      Breaks up the Document into Shingles of size 'numWords' and returns a ShinglizeResult containing these Shingles and a reference to the Document.

        public WordShinglizer(int numWords,
                      String pattern)
        Instantiates a new Word shinglizer.
        Parameters:
        numWords - The number of words in one shingle.
        pattern - The regex pattern that splits what a word is in the context of a shingle.

    • Method Detail

      • shinglize

        public ShinglizeResult shinglize(Document document)
        Breaks up the Document into Shingles of size 'numWords' and returns a ShinglizeResult containing these Shingles and a reference to the Document.
        Specified by:
        shinglize in interface Shinglizer
        Parameters:
        document - The Document that will be broken up into Shingles.
        Returns:
        A ShinglizeResult that consists of the Document and a list of Shingles.

        Takes a collection of strings and returns a new collection with every string changed to lower case.

        Returns:
        the new collection with lower case Strings.
